questions.question: $$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 1 $$ $$ x2 = g(x1) $$ $$\text{equation } = cos(x) - x × exp(x) $$ $$ g(x) = \frac{cos(x)}{exp(x)} $$ $$\text{What is function value of 6th iteration using one point iterative method?}$$

$$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 1 $$ $$ x2 = g(x1) $$ $$\text{equation } = cos(x) - x × exp(x) $$ $$ g(x) = \frac{cos(x)}{exp(x)} $$ $$\text{What is root value of 6th iteration using one point iterative method?}$$
